== Anjuna (CT) (626694) ==

Anjuna (CT) is a town in the [[BARDEZ 002]] taluka of [[NORTH GOA]] district with an area of 13 sq. km. and harbouring 2243 households with total population of 9636 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 22 km. Male population is 4921 and female population is 4715. Scheduled Caste population is 165 and Scheduled Tribes population is 40. Census Location Code of the town is 626694<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (population_total 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 182 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 477 km. Railway station is at TIVIM at a distance of 19 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has closed drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 1600 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at MAPUSA (10 km) .
